resources.string: Welcome! please choose a device to connect.
View photos from your mobile device on a 2015 Samsung Smart TV.
Make sure your TV and mobile device are on the same WiFi network.

1. Must be Compatible 2015 Samsung Smart TV.
2. Mobile and TV must be on same WiFi network.
3. When mobile discovers TV, will appear on the top right corner of screen.
4. Tap to select the tv you wish to use
Do you want more information about Multiscreen SDK?
